title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 122.3 - Modification of Federal items of tax preference for depletion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 122.3 - Modification of Federal items of tax preference for depletion

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 622(b)(3)

The Federal items of tax preference for depletion must be
excluded in computing the New York items of tax preference. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
122.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
